byline.original: By KAREEM FAHIM and MOHAMAD FAHIM ABED

abstract: Taliban insurgents kill 33 people, including 4 civilians, in bombing of bus convoy carrying police cadets outside Kabul, Afghanistan; attack is latest in series during Muslim holy month of Ramadan, during which Afghan government and its allies had hoped to forge cease-fire.

headline.print_headline: Taliban Attack on Police Cadets Kills at Least 33
headline.main: Taliban Attack on Afghan Police Cadets Kills at Least 33

snippet: The double bombing on a police convoy was the second large-scale assault by the insurgents in Kabul in less than two weeks....
lead_paragraph: The double bombing on a police convoy was the second large-scale assault by the insurgents in Kabul in less than two weeks.
